name: Pachirisu
description: The EleSquirrel Pokémon. It makes fur balls that crackle with static electricity. It stores them with berries in tree holes.

abilities.name: Run Away
abilities.description: This Pokémon cannot be the target of an attack of opportunity.

abilities.name: Pickup
abilities.description: If an opponent uses a consumable held item in battle, this Pokémon gains a copy of it if it is not currently holding an item.

abilities.name: Volt Absorb
abilities.description: This Pokémon takes no damage from electricity or electric-type attacks. Instead, half of any electric damage done is absorbed, restoring the Pokémon's HP.
